1.content: Which one should gain? Ash pikachu or both?
1.title: The Beginning of the gain

11.content: How should he gain? Force Feeding? Magic? Sumo School? Or Stuffing?
11.title: Ash

choices: He Should Walk Home and see mom
Go to the Sumo School and Get Fat!
113.content:
It was just another boring old day in Pallet town Ash was just finishing up a pokemon battle with his friend Greg, Greg had an Umbreon in battle, Ash used his main partner Pikachu in the battle. "Pikachu use Thunderbolt to wrap this all up!" Ash commanded pikachu. "Pika.CHUUUUU!!!" A thunderbolt came from pikachu giving Greg's Umbreon a direct hit thus letting Ash wining the battle. "Alright!!"
"Umbreon!" Greg ran over to his Umbreon "Umm.." Said Umbreon "It's alright you did your best. Return" Greg than walked off. Soon ash was heading back home but he saw a new business in town. The sign read. "Sumo School Open for Skinny Males"

So what should Ash do? Walk Home and see mom? Or Go to the Sumo school and get fat?(Ash secretly wanted to be fat.)
113.title: Sumo School

1132.content: Ash walked into the Sumo School and Salking came up and introduced himself. "Hello. I'm the boss of the Sumo School. My name is Slaking. What's yours?" Slaking Said, Ash thought 'Holy... A talking Slaking.. mmm.. Interesting...' "Names Ash Ketchum I've Always Secretly wanted to be fat.. and by fat I mean FAT, "well Alrighty then" Replied Slaking. " I have a way please come in here" Slaking led Ash into a empty, LARGE room It had a scale on the ceiling, Ash was strapped to the floor, but didn't mind it one bit. "There is this one Fattening Element called fat mercury It'll make ANYTHING from chubby, to immobile." Said Slaking. Mechanical arms put a mawashi on ash it was 20XL. Slaking then pushed a button and smoke surronded Ash's Unclothed Body with only the mawashion. then Ash gained...
1132.title: Secretly Fat

113232.content: *ash awakens in his room at the sumo academies stable and yawns immensely, rubbing his ginormous belly and moobs and hips and butt all over, soon he is working out with his large but way smaller stablemates, at two tons ash is the biggest sumo who ever walked the Earth earning immense respect and honor for his stable, what's more, he saw lots of ladies were admiring him, some even wanted to make love to him, even his mom started to fall in love with him, he returned to the food and gorges really heavily, his body now grows even larger and fatter and wider than ever, his mawashi had to be upscaled in size as he grows even fatter*
113232.title: 4000 pounds

choices: When they arrive at the restaurant
114.content:
It was a casual day for Ash and friends in Kanto. They were currently in a random town, and they were staying the night in a Pokémon center. During dinner, Ash was stuffing himself silly. "Ash, you need to stop eating like that. Otherwise you're gonna end up being as big as a Snorlax." Ash's friend Misty said concerned about him. "Quit worrying about me Misty. I've eaten like this my whole life and I haven't got one inch of fat on my body!" Ash said with food in his mouth. "You also need to learn to not talk with your mouth full. It's disgusting." Misty added. Then some stranger walked over to the group."Hey there sorry to interrupt but I couldn't help but notice how big your appetite is and I would like to invite you to my restaurant." The stranger said looking at Ash. "Restaurant? I don't know. I'm actually getting pretty full now." Ash told the stranger. "Are you sure? I'll give you a coupon that gives you a free meal. I'll even let you have one of everything on the menu." The stranger said as he put his arm on Ash's shoulder. "Now we're talking! I accept your offer!" Ash excitedly accepted the man's proposal. "Great, here's the coupon. It has the address at the bottom. See you there!" The man said as he walked away.

"This is great! I can't believe I'm getting a chance to have a huge meal at a restaurant!" Ash said to himself. "Are you sure you should do this Ash? Even a Snorlax has it's limits when it comes to eating." Brock said concerned about his friend. "Well I'm not going to do it right now. I'll go there tomorrow ready to eat as much as I possibly can!" Ash told Brock. We then cut to...
114.title: Stuffing

info.brief_description: Make the poke trainer and pokemon gain weight
info.description:
You may make this happy 10 year pokemon trainer gain weight anyway you'd like magic, wishing, stuffing, force feeding just please follow these rules.
1. No sex keep it kid friendly
2. No gore
3. Rapid and Natural weight gain alright
4. No instant gain
5. HAVE FUN
PLEASE ADD.
